name: MONTANA COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION (MOFI)
sampleDescriptions: Make permanent or extend the New Markets Tax Credit, which expires from the federal tax code 12/31/20. The House permanency bill is HR 1680 and the Senate permanency bill is S 750.
